Material used.Description: Yeast two-hybrid screening was performed using a human fetal brain library to identify interactors of PARK7/DJ-1.

Readout description.Result Description: The M26I variant exhibited stronger interaction with TTRAP compared to wild-type PARK7.
The L166P variant exhibited stronger interaction with TTRAP compared to wild-type PARK7.

Material used.Description: Apoptosis was assessed in neuroblastoma cells treated with proteasome inhibitors and exposed to PARK7/DJ-1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: The M26I variant significantly increased apoptosis compared to wild-type PARK7.
The L166P variant significantly increased apoptosis compared to wild-type PARK7.
